Everything.stimulus: In a world where all senses collide, what would be your ultimate sensory experience?

Who.stimulus: In a festival of senses, whooooooo arrrrrrrre youuuuuuuuuuu?

Tea.stimulus: If you could share a sensory experience over a cup of tea, who would be your companion?

Unbirthday.stimulus: Today is your unbirthday in the Garden of Synesthesia! How will you celebrate this sensory feast?

Cat.stimulus: If you could blend into the sensory tapestry of this festival and reappear anywhere, where would it be and why?

Dream.stimulus: In the immersive dreams of Synesthesia, where does your mind wander?

Flavor.stimulus: If your essence were a flavor experienced at Synesthesia, what would it taste like?

Rabbit.stimulus: If you were always late for one sensory experience here, which one would it be?

Cards.stimulus: If you could command the elements of Synesthesia like a deck of cards, which sense would you choose to master?

Potion.stimulus: If a potion could heighten one of your senses for this festival, which would you choose, and what would you explore first?

Adventure.stimulus: What sensory adventure awaits you at the next installation in the Garden of Synesthesia?

Royal.stimulus: If you were the ruler of this sensory kingdom, what would your first decree be?

Creatures.stimulus: Which sensory experience here would guide you through the wonders of Synesthesia, and why?

Guest.stimulus: If you could invite any artist or creator to this festival, who would it be and why?

Teacup.stimulus: If your senses could speak after this experience, what stories would they tell?
